fields.title: Select integration branch in new/edit ticket
fields.body: The integration branch needs to be selectable from the web ui.

comment.text: It doesn't make sense to select the integration branch in *new ticket* because not all tickets will have commits.  I updated the *edit ticket* page to allow specifying the integration branch in 06eb51f13d9dcd4e4e5d9d7bb0db4cf18a67b23e if the ticket has a patchset.
